content: spiralini hat jane tanner knit jane knit sizes small 20­21 medium 22­23 head circumference gauge 5 sts/1 in stockinette stitch on larger needles spiralini hat by jane tanner knit jane knit © 2012 for personal use only not for commercial use in any way materials 3 5 oz worsted weight yarn sample in plucky knitter primo worsted us size 6 circular & us size 8 needles for working in the round double points or circulars 1 stitch marker abbreviations kfb­knit into the front and back of the stitch k2tog­knit two together co 88 96 sts using us 6 circular use a larger needle if necessary for a loose cast on place marker and join for knitting in the round making sure not to twist work 9 10 rounds of ribbing *k2 p2 repeat from * around after the last round of ribbing remove marker knit one stitch and replace the marker this will shift the marker one stitch to the left increase round *kfb k3 repeat from * around 110 120 sts next round change to us 8 needles and knit begin spiral pattern round 1 *kfb k 7 sts k2tog repeat from * around 11 12 times round 2 knit continue working pattern rounds 1 & 2 until hat is 6 5 long from cast on edge if you d like less slouch work to 6 ; for more slouch work to 7 decreases round 1 *kfb k6 k3tog repeat from * around 99 108 sts round 2 knit round 3 *kfb k5 k3tog repeat from * around 88 96 sts round 4 knit round 5 *kfb k4 k3tog repeat from * around 77 84 sts round 6 knit round 7 *kfb k3 k3tog repeat from * around 66 72 sts round 8 knit round 9 *kfb k2 k3tog repeat from * around 55 60 sts round 10 knit round 11 *kfb k1 k3tog repeat from * around 44 48 sts round 12 knit round 13 *kfb k3tog repeat from * around 33 36 sts round 14 *k1 k2tog repeat from * around 22 24 sts round 15 *k2tog repeat from * around 11 12 sts round 16 for small size k2tog 5 times k1 6 sts for medium size k2tog 6 times 6 sts cut 6 yarn tail and pull through last 6 sts on the needles weave in all ends spiralini hat by jane tanner knit jane knit © 2012 for personal use only not for commercial use in any way
